    • Constructor Detail

      • MailCard

        public MailCard(java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String image,
                java.lang.String text,
                int amount,
                java.lang.String choice1,
                java.lang.String type)
        Constructor

        Postcondition: Sets the title ,image and text of the card.Also sets the amount of money the player needs to pay or take,the choice to press the button to accept and the type of the mail card

        Parameters:
        title - Title of the mail card.
        image - Image of the mail card.
        text - Text written on the mail card
        amount - The money the player needs to pay or take.
        choice1 - Accept the mail card.
        type - The type of the mail card.

      • action

        public void action(Player player)
        Transformer

        Precondition: The player must be valid instance of the class Player. Postcondition: Based on the type of the mail card the method chooses to perform on of the 6 actions.
